author: David Porter
title: Backup of bodies overwhelms nursing home amid outbreak - The Associated Press
description: Backup of bodies overwhelms nursing home amid outbreak The Associated Press BREAKING: UK reports further 861 coronavirus deaths in hospitals Sky News Daily COVID-19 status update Newnan Times-Herald Spain virus death count 'may be thousands short' - The Jakar…
content:
An extraordinary number of coronavirus-related deaths overwhelmed a nursing home in northern New Jersey where police found 18 bodies in what the governor called a makeshift morgue on two consecutive days earlier this week.
Police got an anonymous tip Monday … [+3839 chars]
